name: Redchillee
overview:
RedChillee Technologies was founded on 2008 as a small web graphics and animation company with a group of professionals. We have designed & developed websites for large, medium and small companies. We have expertise in information design, interface design, usability, search engine optimization, multimedia integration, 2D & 3D animation, E-learning, mobile gaming, virtual effects and content management. We have a massive collection of websites, 2D & 3D works, story boards and E-Learning portfolios

Redchillee Technologies & Exports located in Chennai, South India. Redchillee has different verticals. We are engaged in Exports, Trading and Technologies as well. We are pioneer company in Granite Exports which was called before â€œA-One Granites â€œ. It is now formally merged into Redchillee. Our own quarries operated in different areas in India. We do also trade in Rice and Coconut products. We have 30+ years of experience in Rice business. We were doing Rice exports previously before our government stopped export of rice.

Where as in technologies division, We are group of Fine arts professionals working to-gather in different verticals like animation, graphics, gaming, E-learning, Web Design and development, Corporate Identities, Corporate Presentations, Web Maintenance, etc.. We have a Strong portfolio of Economical web design and development, Animation, Gaming, E-learning, Graphics, etc. We conceptualized our technology division to provide complete business solutions to all the small, medium and big organizations wanting to have a web presence. We provide comprehensive IT solutions and services.

Redchillee Technologies understands the concerns of your corporate website identity. We specialize in developing integrated web portals and solutions based on current standards and technology. Being hosted successful web solutions; we cater your unique web requirements from all aspects of your needs.Our Professional Experience and Innovative Creative Ideas Gave Redchillee Technologies to succeed in Multimedia industry. The creative intelligence of Our Professionals gives your business a right-mix of audio, video, animation, and graphics. We depict your products, services, and websites in new style and approach. Our Professionals experience grants us to provide you Stunning designs for your business approach. We deliver high quality designs on time at the affordable cost with personalized attention to our clients around the world round the clock.

Our expertise :

Online site builder Web Design and Development Next Generation Mobile Technology 2D and 3D Animation

Values:

People We encourage continuous learning and strive to develop our people to their highest potential.

Excellence We pursue excellence in everything we do.

Teamwork We support each other and work together to achieve our objectives.

Responsiveness We are responsive to the expectations of our customers.
